backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor defining no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three UI-related feature updates and their associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing brief summaries of various frontend components, hooks, styles, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers defining warm OKLCH color variables for light/dark modes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout rendering Hero, Timeline, and Proposal sections with a themed footer.
frontend/src/components/celebration/Cele: Generates animated falling heart and confetti particles in warm colors using React state and effects.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with enhanced warm gradient orbs, decorative hearts, and styled typography.
frontend/src/components/sections/Proposa: Proposal section with Yes/No buttons, moving No button logic, message cycling, and celebration trigger.
frontend/src/components/sections/Timelin: Timeline section rendering milestone cards with reveal animations and corrected milestone title.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating it and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context/provider handling login, stored identity loading, status tracking, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Provides a ref and boolean indicating whether an element is in view using IntersectionObserver with optional one‑time triggering.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, dark mode themes, and animation utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn helper merging class names using clsx and tailwind‑merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider then renders App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Holds project metadata, requirements, design notes, and known issues for the Proposal Day website.
